titles.title: How Lovely Is Your Dwelling Place (Psalm 84)

verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}For a day in Your presence is far better to me than gold Or living my whole life somewhere else …… And I would rather be a doorkeeper in Your fold Than to take my fate upon myself……{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}For You are my Sun and my Shield, You are my Lover from the start And the Highway to Your city Runs through my heart.{/lang-eng}
